div.class: col-3 text-center p-0 border border-dark border-top-bottom-left-none

div.div: Individuals (Invluding MIXED Income Earner), Estates, and Trusts

div.i: Enter all required information in CAPITAL LETTERS using BLACK ink Mark applicable boxed with
an "X". Two couples must be filled with BIR and one held by the Tax Filler

tr.td: PART I - Background Information of Taxpayer/Filler
Single Propietor Professional Estate Trust Copensation Earner
D014 Income from Profession-Graduated IT Rates
D017 Business Income from Profession - 8% IT Rates
8 Taxpayer's Name (Last Name, First Name, Middle Name)/ ESTATE OF (First Name, Middle Name, Last Name)/ TRUST FAO: (First Name, Middle Name, Last Name)

19 1ncome EXEMPT from Icome Tax?
(if yes, fill out also consolidation of ALL activities per Tax Regime (PART X))

20 Income subject to SPECIAL/PREFERENTAL RATE?
(if yes, fill out also consolidation of ALL activities per Tax Regime (PART X))

Optional Standard Deduction (OSD)
(40% OF Gross Sales/Recipts/Revenues/Fees (Sec. 34(L)); NIRC)

Graduated Rates
(Choose Method of Deduction in Item 21A)

8% in lieu of Graduated Rates under Sec. 24(A) & Percentage Tax under Sec. 116 of NIRC
(available if gross sales/recipts and other non-operating income do not exceed Three milion pesos (P3M))
23 Less: Total Tax Credits/Payments (From Part VII Item 10)

25 Less: Potion of Tax Payable Allowed for 2nd Installment to be paid or before October 15
(50% or less of item 22)
26 Amount of Tax Payable/(Overpayment) (Item 24 Less Item 25)
31 Total Amount Payable/(Overpayment) (Sum of Items 26 and 30)
32 Aggregate Amount Payable/(Overpayment) (Sum of Items 20 and 30)
If overpayment, mark one (1) box only, (Once the choice is made, the same is irrevocable)

td.span: To be issued a Tax Credit Certificate (TCC)
To be carried over as a tax credit for next year/quarter

td.div: I declare under the penalties perjury that this return, and an its attachments, have been made in good faith, verified by me, and to the best of my knowledge and belief, are true and correct, pursuant to the provisions f the National Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and regulation issued under authority thereof. Further, I give my consent to the processing of my information as contemplated under the *Data Privacy ACT of 2023 (RA. No. 10173) for legitimate and lawful purposes. (If signed by an Authorized Representative, indicate TIN and attach authorization letter)

tr.td: Printed Name and Signature of Taxpayer/Authorized Representative
